EmailTemplate.subject: {!Customer_Transition__c.Account_OMX_Key__c} - {!Customer_Transition__c.Account_Name__c} MPS Alert
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Managed Print Services Team:
Please be advised this OD North Customer has been placed in a status of ON DECK.
That means we are beginning migration discussions with the customer about pricing, implementation, etc. This customer is currently utilizing MPS services.
Please contact the Sales Representative who manages this account. If the Customer has any special set up needs, it is your responsibility to work with the Sales Representative to ensure that business is not adversely impacted during migration.
Link to Customer: {!Customer_Transition__c.Link}
Thank you for your support.
BSD SALES OPERATIONS TEAM
